title: Reckless Love
lyrics: Reckless Love
Cory Asbury | Caleb Culver | Ran Jackson
INTRO VERSE 2
When I was Your foe,
VERSE 1 Still Your love fought for me
Before I spoke a word, You have been so, so good to me
You were singing over me When I felt no worth,
You have been so, so good to me You paid it all for me
Before I took a breath, You have been so, so kind to me
You breathed Your life in me
BRIDGE
There's no shadow You won't light up
CHORUS Mountain You won't climb up, coming after me
(And) O, the overwhelming, never - ending, There's no wall You won't kick down
Reckless love of God Lie You won't tear down, coming after me
O, it chases me down, fights 'til I'm found,
OUTRO
I couldn't earn it, I don't de - serve it,
Still You give Yourself a - way
O, the overwhelming, never - ending,
Reckless love of God, yeah
TURNAROUND
CCLI Song # 7089641

chords: You have been so, so kind to me Dm7 C(4)
Leaves the ninety - nine ||: Dm7 | C(4) | Bb2 | F :||
